Uses of Class
zipkin.storage.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchStorage.Builder

    • Uses of ElasticsearchStorage.Builder in zipkin.storage.elasticsearch

      Methods in zipkin.storage.elasticsearch that return ElasticsearchStorage.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ElasticsearchStorage.Builder ElasticsearchStorage.builder() 
      ElasticsearchStorage.Builder ElasticsearchStorage.Builder.cluster(String cluster)
      The elasticsearch cluster to connect to, defaults to "elasticsearch".
      ElasticsearchStorage.Builder ElasticsearchStorage.Builder.hosts(List<String> hosts)
      A comma separated list of elasticsearch hostnodes to connect to, in host:port format.
      ElasticsearchStorage.Builder ElasticsearchStorage.Builder.index(String index)
      The index prefix to use when generating daily index names.
